item.title: Blog Set Up
item.description: As a first assigment of Human Computer Interface class, we had to create a Blog to showcase the work we will do during our master. I created my website using Hugo, a fast and modern static site generator. Here are the different steps to set up this portfolio : Installation on MacOs Open a terminal and type the command brew install hugo Go the website Hugo Themes Choose Toha theme and click on the Github repository Fork the repository and change the repository name to [your github username].
